Package org.daisy.dotify.common.layout

Provides a generalized way to split up a sequence of units, for example lines of text into pages.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SplitPointCost<T extends SplitPointUnit>  
    SplitPointUnit
    Provides an interface for split point units.
    Supplements<T>
    Provides an interface for getting supplementary units.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SplitPoint<T extends SplitPointUnit>
    Provides a data object to keep the information about a split point result.
    SplitPointData<T extends SplitPointUnit>  
    SplitPointHandler<T extends SplitPointUnit>
    Breaks units into results.

Package org.daisy.dotify.common.layout Description

Provides a generalized way to split up a sequence of units, for example lines of text into pages.
